entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
